content: in this legal case a court in oristano has made a final resolution regarding the division of real estate among several parties the court assigns exclusive ownership of different properties to each party involved and orders certain parties to make payments to others the court applies principles of the civil code and considers the arguments and evidence presented by each party the court also addresses preliminary issues and determines the admissibility of certain claims the court calculates the value of the properties and ensures an equal division among the parties the court settles the matter by rejecting opposing requests and objections granting requests for division and nullity of donated money and declaring the dissolution of the community property inherited the court assigns exclusive ownership of various properties including a flat in cagliari a building in oristano a building in morgongiori and a building in arbus the court also orders certain parties to make payments for expenses and legal mortgages the court rejects requests for collation and declares certain claims regarding ownership division as inadmissible costs of the proceedings are to be borne by the parties and the defendants are ordered to pay a unified contribution to the treasury the decision was made on may 10 2022 in oristano
